connector.description:
Upload data to an Amazon S3 Bucket.

The basic authentication method for the S3 service is to specify an access key and a secret key. These parameters are optional because the Kamelet provides a default credentials provider.

If you use the default credentials provider, the S3 client loads the credentials through this provider and doesn't use the basic authentication method.

In the header, you can optionally set the `file` / `ce-partition` property to specify the name of the file to upload.

If you do not set the property in the header, the Kamelet uses the exchange ID for the file name.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.bucketNameOrAr.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.bucketNameOrArn
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.bucketNameOrAr.description: The S3 Bucket name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.accessKey.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.accessKey
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.accessKey.description: The access key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.secretKey.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.secretKey
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.secretKey.description: The secret key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.autoCreateBuck.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.autoCreateBucket
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.autoCreateBuck.description: Specifies to automatically create the S3 bucket.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.useDefaultCred.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.useDefaultCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.useDefaultCred.description: If true, the S3 client loads credentials through a default credentials provider. If false, it uses the basic authentication method (access key and secret key).

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.uriEndpointOve.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.uriEndpointOverride
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.uriEndpointOve.description: The overriding endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also select the `overrideEndpoint` option.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.overrideEndpoi.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.overrideEndpoint
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.overrideEndpoi.description: Select this option to override the endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also provide a URI for the `uriEndpointOverride` option.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.forcePathStyle.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.forcePathStyle
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.forcePathStyle.description: Forces path style when accessing AWS S3 buckets.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.keyName.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.keyName
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-sink.keyName.description: The key name for saving an element in the bucket.
